title: O/L lecture, classes period extended to May 20th
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Department of Examinations noted that a decision was made to extend the time period granted to conduct tuition classes, seminars, workshops, and conferences for the O/L examination until the 20th of May.
The Department of Examinations stated that the decision was taken after considering the requests made by parents, teachers, principals, and candidates.
Earlier, the Department of Examinations had decided to prohibit tuition class workshops, seminars, and lectures related to the G.C.E Ordinary Level Examination from midnight on Tuesday (17).
